p: To identify the phylogenetic position of S. rostratum, phylogenetic analysis was conducted. The aligned complete chloroplast genome sequences of S. rostratum and 45 other species using MAFFT (Katoh and Standley 2013) were used for phylogenetic analysis. The neighbour-joining tree was constructed using MEGA 7.0 with 1000 bootstrap replicates (Kumar etÂ al. 2016). Phylogenetic analysis showed that S. rostratum and S. elaeagnifolium are closely related to each other within the genus Solanum ( Figure 1). The chloroplast resource may provide valuable guidelines for the management and utilization of S. rostratum.
